vendor.name: Hakkin
vendor.blurb: As you peruse various displays around the shop, Hakkin watches you with her head resting in one of her hands and a big smile on her face. She contentedly wags her tail, every few seconds you can see its white tip appear for a moment from below the counter. You can't help but smile as you return to shopping. As you do, you hear a soft giggle from the front desk.
